summary: Diff implements key branding copy updates in backend, adds a testimonials slider component, updates navbar to the required 8 items/order, adds smooth scrolling via CSS, enhances Booking with WhatsApp link + confirmation state, and updates index.html SEO meta/title. Footer and Home appear to include contact/scroll behavior, but some requirements (notably global unique imagery and full routing correctness) cannot be fully verified from the provided truncated diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure every page and major section uses unique, high-quality travel imagery with no repeated images across the site (including cards/grids).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows some image URLs/paths (e.g., Home hero uses a generated asset, Home featured destinations use Unsplash, Honeymoon uses a mix of generated + Unsplash), but the summary does not provide a complete inventory across all pages/sections/cards to verify the global "no repeats" constraint.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the Home page loads as the default first page and that every top-nav route renders without any 'Not Found' or blank-state errors for the 8 specified routes.
missing_requirements.reason: Navbar link definitions are present, but the diff summary does not include the router route-table configuration (e.g., in App/router files) to confirm that each path is actually registered and renders without errors.

hallucinated_features.description: Privacy Policy page and footer link to /privacy.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for a Privacy Policy page/route; footer includes an internal link and the project includes a Privacy page component.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark/light mode toggle in the navbar (next-themes theme switching).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires theme color presets persistence and site-wide branding updates, but does not request a light/dark mode toggle UI.
